1.title: El Cometa
1.plot: HD. (ESP) 'The Comet.' (Season One) Two retired teachers bring astronomy to poor children in their school-bus observatory called, 'The Comet.'

2.title: La Cosecha
2.plot: HD. (ESP) 'The Harvest.' (Season One) In northern Jalisco, Enrique Lomnitz and his team help a community with a serious water scarcity problem.

3.title: Las Patronas
3.plot: HD. (ESP) 'Las Patronas.' (Season One) A group of women in Veracruz, Mexico deliver food and water to undocumented Central Americans.

4.title: Los Invisibles
4.plot: HD. (ESP) 'The Invisible Ones.' (Season One) Get to know the noble faces of some of the near 6 million undocumented Mexicans living in the U.S.

5.title: La Pandilla
5.plot: HD. (ESP) 'The Gang.' (Season One) Carlos Cruz changed his direction in life and formed an organization to build alternatives to gangs.

6.title: Los Topos
6.plot: HD. (ESP) 'Los Topos.' (Season One) The volunteer rescue brigade Topos Tlatelolco continue on 30 years after the 1985 Mexico City earthquake.

imdb.plot outline: Heroes Cotidianos or Everyday Heroes is a series of six episodes recounting the stories of real people who happen to have become true heroes of our time. These are not great or well-known personalities; the series is more of a celebration of everyday heroes within their own communities, heroes of forgotten or little-known causes. They are heroes in their daily lives on their own initiative, whose actions have a real impact on the people around them. Everyday Heroes is not just any series, and neither are its protagonists just anyone. Their stories, like their personalities, will stay with you and make you look at the people around you in different ways. When it's over, you might just be walking down the street and wonder how many people you bump into along the way might turn out to be true super-heroes of everyday life.
imdb.title: Héroes cotidianos
plot: Heroes Cotidianos is a series of six episodes recounting the stories of real people who happen to have become true heroes of our time and of their own communities.::HBO Latin America

Heroes Cotidianos or Everyday Heroes is a series of six episodes recounting the stories of real people who happen to have become true heroes of our time. These are not great or well-known personalities; the series is more of a celebration of everyday heroes within their own communities, heroes of forgotten or little-known causes. They are heroes in their daily lives on their own initiative, whose actions have a real impact on the people around them. Everyday Heroes is not just any series, and neither are its protagonists just anyone. Their stories, like their personalities, will stay with you and make you look at the people around you in different ways. When it's over, you might just be walking down the street and wonder how many people you bump into along the way might turn out to be true super-heroes of everyday life.::HBO Latin America
